Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Mike Scott (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago to Cincinnati on 4/11/1986 (Going to CIN: 2B Ryne Sandberg. Going to CHC: P Andy Ashby, P Ron Robinson)...
Injured on 5/27/1986 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1986, hitting .542 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1987, hitting .571 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1987, hitting .591 with 4 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Philadelphia on 7/9/1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1988, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
9/28/1988: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $8,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1988, hitting .409 with 4 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/18/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1990, hitting .577 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Pittsburgh on 9/28/1990...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1990, hitting .312 with 38 HR, 120 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1990...
Hit for the cycle against Montreal on 6/4/1991...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 6/4/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 5/16/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1992...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Atlanta on 4/29/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/1993, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
